title: Please help identify minimal font (no image)
content:
can anyone tell me what this minimal font is?

author: anonymous

comments.content: Can't identify what we can't see, Chez...

Nonetheless, I think it's Comic Sans.   
   
hhp

it's so minimal i can't see it...   
   
since when is comic sans so minimal, mr. papazian?..

OOps!   
   
i finally got the images to show. phew! everyone come n c my other post.
ha ha, hrant. i hope i didn't get you on some kind of comic sans kick.
